Name: Kino's Journey
Japanese_name: Kino no Tabi: The Beautiful World
Tags: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Sci Fi, Episodic, Melancholy, Motorcycles, Based on a Light Novel, Violence
Description: "In another world, there exist many countries, each with different cultures, customs, and traditions. From technological marvels to folk legends, each location yields a vast wealth of insight of its people: their hopes and their dreams, their failures and fears. Kino is a traveler whose goal is to visit as many new places as possible, learning about others' ways of life, but also making sure to stay clear of their affairs. Together with the talking motorrad Hermes, Kino sets out to explore the beautiful world and meet its inhabitants, wherever they may be."
Related_Mange: Kino's Journey: The Beautiful World (Light Novel), Gakuen Kino (Light Novel), Gakuen Kino, Kino's Journey: The Beautiful World, Kino's Journey: The Beautiful World (Gou)
Related_anime: Kino's Journey: Tower Country, Kino's Journey: Life Goes On, Dengeki Bunko 2007 Movie Festival Special, Kino's Journey: Byouki no Kuni -For You-, Kino's Journey -the Beautiful World- the Animated Series

Name: Kino's Journey -the Beautiful World- the Animated Series
Japanese_name: Kino no Tabi: The Beautiful World - the Animated Series
Tags: Adventure, Fantasy, Sci Fi, Episodic, Guns, Motorcycles, Based on a Light Novel, Violence
Description: 'Kino and\xa0the talking motorrad, Hermes, travel the land together; visiting different countries and learning about the various customs and cultures of the people they encounter. From technological marvels to nations with unique laws and political intrigue, each location yields a wealth of insight of its people. The beautiful world they inhabit is a vast one, and a number of other travelers share tales of their adventures as well - an exiled prince wandering the land with his talking dog, an orphaned child raised by artificial intelligence, and a former slave girl with a talking motorrad of her own\xa0who photographs the world around her as she travels through it. Although the world is not always beautiful, its rich diversity lends it a fascinating loveliness that is worth the journey to see.'
Related_Mange: Kino's Journey: The Beautiful World (Light Novel), Gakuen Kino (Light Novel), Gakuen Kino, Kino's Journey: The Beautiful World, Kino's Journey: The Beautiful World (Gou)
